markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Giant Worker Bee](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1609)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Worker bees, exclusively female, exist to feed and defend a hive. They have no qualms about sacrificing their lives when confronting intruders in their territory. Worker bees can fight singly, in small groups, or in swarms of dozens. Giant worker bees inject a venom with their stings, but this venom is rarely dangerous except to people sensitive to it. Other worker bees have no stinger and only bite their enemies.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Giant Worker Bee](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1609)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +5; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 16

**Weaknesses**
smoke susceptibility

**Smoke Susceptibility** A giant bee is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round if it starts its turn in heavy smoke.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +8 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-288" />
name: Giant Worker Bee
